document_data.mainbody:
Wyshbryn Saldar was a wererat spy of the Riverside Rats gang, who dwelt in the Wheloon Prison of Cormyr during the late 15 century DR.
As a wererat, Wyshbryn had black fur.
Wyshbryn lived in Wheloon Prison with his fellow Riverside Rats until they were forced from their hideout by the Night Brigade under Storna Harnwood, who turned it into a Temple of Shar. After being driven outside the prison, Wyshbryn spied on the Night Brigades foul Grand Arcanist Darstil Vurusk, who performed horrible experiments upon helpless prisoners, and eventually sent an attack to kill him and end his madness.
